entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
